name: Mazik
description:
Get ready for the latest addition to the Mascoteers' library - Mazik!

With classic arcade gameplay that recalls some of the most addictive games of old, Mazik will keep you entertained for hours on end with fast paced action that appeals to young and old alike.

Mazik is a 2D adventure game set in a colourful maze world of sharp corners, revolving doors and plenty of booby traps along the way to trip you out and end your game. As your character rapidly moves toward the right of screen, you'll need to tap in a timely manner to change direction and navigate your way around the unpredictable twists and turns. Prepare to have your reflexes tested to no end!

Much like the maze itself, Mazik is easy to get into but not so easy to find your way out of it's grasp. Expect another addictive game that will challenge you time and time again.

Download Mazik for free today and find out what all the hype is about!
